title: "Hey guys, I have 2k ping. I can't help until it goes down"
body:
"Everyone report ChickenWrap cuz he didnt help at drag n he just let mid get super fed because mid got 3 kills on us at dragon when he was lagging for 30 seconds"

"kid ur reproted cuz u cry about lag"

"But Braum, I only mentioned I had lag and couldn't help because that's my job as a team mate. To let you know when I can and can't be there for you."

"dnt care kid u blame lag on evry death"

"But Braum, the only time I mentioned lag was when I was having lag and was *trying* to farm on my tower with it and you guys decided it was a good idea to do dragon."

"lol dnt care kid u cry super hard bout ur lag n not ur getting verbal abuse report lol k thx bye"

I am sad now, GD. I was lagging for 30 seconds and I told my team and I got reported for it because it happened at an inopportune time.
